doc.previous: Hamburg has 54 hospitals The University Medical Center Hamburg Eppendorf with about 1 450 beds houses a large medical school There are also smaller private hospitals On 1 January 2011 there were about 11 350 hospital beds 102 The city had 5 663 physicians in private practice and 456 pharmacies in 2010 103
doc.after: Hamburg is a major transportation hub connected to four Autobahnen motorways and the most important railway junction on the route to Scandinavia
